text: If you have active kids but don’t know what sport they love, then Shaw’s might be a good start. They cover a variety of sports that the kids try each week. Great for kids 4 to 7 years old while they learn what sports the like. They closed at Thompson, which was a shame. As Kallang is a little harder to get to. In the end, my kids love Rugby and Soccer. And they got to try Cricket
A great variety of sports for kids per session. Highly recommended.
